description: This file defines the NoteRepository class which acts as a data repository layer interfacing with the NoteDao for CRUD operations on Note data objects in an Android app.

classes.name: NoteRepository
classes.description: Repository class managing Note data operations through a NoteDao interface.

methods.name: searchNotes
methods.description: Retrieves notes matching the search query as LiveData.

methods.name: upsert
methods.description: Inserts or updates a Note in the database asynchronously.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a provided Note from the database asynchronously.

methods.name: getNoteById
methods.description: Retrieves a Note by its ID asynchronously.
